com.enjin.sdk.schemas.shared.arguments

Interface TransactionFragmentArguments<T extends VariableHolder<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the implementing class
    All Superinterfaces:
    VariableHolder<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PlayerFragmentArguments<T>, TransactionRequestArguments<T>, WalletFragmentArguments<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AdvancedSendAsset, AdvancedSendAsset, ApproveEnj, ApproveEnj, ApproveMaxEnj, ApproveMaxEnj, BridgeAsset, BridgeAsset, BridgeAssets, BridgeAssets, BridgeClaimAsset, BridgeClaimAsset, CompleteTrade, CreateAsset, CreateTrade, DecreaseMaxMeltFee, DecreaseMaxTransferFee, GetPlayer, GetPlayer, GetPlayers, GetTransaction, GetTransactions, GetWallet, GetWallet, GetWallets, MeltAsset, MeltAsset, Message, Message, MintAsset, ReleaseReserve, ResetEnjApproval, ResetEnjApproval, SendAsset, SendAsset, SendEnj, SendEnj, SetApprovalForAll, SetApprovalForAll, SetMeltFee, SetTransferable, SetTransferFee, SetUri, SetWhitelisted, UpdateName

    public interface TransactionFragmentArguments<T extends VariableHolder<T>>
extends VariableHolder<T>
    Fragment interface used to request certain information from transactions returned by the platform.
    See Also:
    Transaction

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default T transactionAssetIdFormat(AssetIdFormat assetIdFormat)
      Sets the desired asset ID format when used with withAssetData().
      default T withAssetData()
      Sets the request to include the asset data with the transaction.
      default T withBlockchainData()
      Sets the request to include the blockchain data with the transaction.
      default T withEncodedData()
      Sets the request to include the encoded data with the transaction when used with withBlockchainData().
      default T withError()
      Sets the request to include the error with the transaction when used with withBlockchainData().
      default T withLogEvent()
      Sets the request to include the event data in the receipt logs when used with withReceiptLogs().
      default T withMeta()
      Sets the request to include the metadata with the transaction.
      default T withNonce()
      Sets the request to include the nonce with the transaction when used with withBlockchainData().
      default T withReceipt()
      Sets the request to include the receipt with the transaction when used with withBlockchainData().
      default T withReceiptLogs()
      Sets the request to include the logs in the receipt when used with withReceipt().
      default T withSignedTxs()
      Sets the request to include the signed transactions with the transaction when used with withBlockchainData().
      default T withState()
      Sets the request to include the state with the transaction when used with withBlockchainData().
      default T withTransactionProjectUuid()
      Sets the request to include the Project with its UUID that the transaction belongs to.
      default T withTransactionWalletAddress()
      Sets the request to include the Wallet with its Ethereum address that belongs to the transaction.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.enjin.sdk.graphql.VariableHolder

        getVariables, isSet, set
